lib/hope/tuple/compute_field_count_recursive.h File Reference

the file contains several functions for recursively calculating the number of fields within the structure. Only user-defined types are computed recursively, the classes of the standard library are considered a single whole More...

Detailed Description

the file contains several functions for recursively calculating the number of fields within the structure. Only user-defined types are computed recursively, the classes of the standard library are considered a single whole
